title: Welcome To Savannah Georgia! - Savannah, GA | Savannah.com
text: Winter in Savannah is mild and charming, with temperatures usually ranging from the mid-40s to low 60s °F. The city’s historic streets, squares and oak-lined avenues are especially picturesque. Visitors enjoy pleasant weather for walking tours, riverfront strolls, and exploring historic sites without the summer crowds. Plan your winter getaway to the Hostess City and enjoy Savannah’s cozy, inviting atmosphere that blends Southern charm with a gentle winter calm. Historic District | City Market | River Street | Tybee Island – Savannah’s Beach
